title: Breakingviews TV: Bankrupt guns
text:
Breakingviews TV: Bankrupt guns   04:16 
In the wake of Saturday’s huge gun-control march in Washington, D.C., Rob Cox and Richard Beales discuss the bankruptcy of firearms maker Remington Outdoor and why financiers are wary of such investments. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In the wake of Saturday’s huge gun-control march in Washington, D.C., Rob Cox and Richard Beales discuss the bankruptcy of firearms maker Remington Outdoor and why financiers are wary of such investments.
